subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 23 points for France in its 78-66 victory over Germany yesterday at the European Championship in Madrid. Dirk Nowitzki had 28 points for Germany, which must win its final two Group F matches to guarantee a place in the elimination round.Also in Group F, Lithuania and Slovenia remained unbeaten and reached the quarterfinals, which begin Thursday. Lithuania edged Italy, 79-74, and Slovenia defeated Turkey, 66-51.
